entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon except a few flurries over higher terrain. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind east 20 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Flurries over higher terrain in the evening. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 15 February 2023
